tweets.text: @Ghimbob @TheBigApe_ @Ahmaadnyc @iacquirethought Cop did nothing wrong. Other cops would have pulled their gun.

The 2018 Rockefeller tree has ~50,000 lights, at any given point you can see 2/3 of them or ~35,000.
In 2017 guns were involved in 39,773 deaths.
Now look at that tree again and picture every light as the face of a person killed with a gun and tell me things don't need to change https://t.co/FdCvoAExHG
Olha certas coisas eu não aguento nem revirar os olhos mais

It's 10 pm on Christmas eve and my dad just got dressed, loaded his gun, and took off his rings to go outside to fight his arch nemesis.

Squirrels. 

He is fighting squirrels in the attic.

I hope that viral gun girl posts a video of her shooting the wrapping paper off of the Christmas presents she bought herself, all of which are guns, with a caption like: “Looks like Santa respects the second amendment. And yeah I still believe in Santa. Take that, libs.”
In Home Alone 2, Marv is hit in the face by bricks from the top of a 3-story building. Falls down a multi-story hole, gets electrocuted, etc

shittt if someone pulls a gun out on me, my ass is begging 🤣🤣 https://t.co/wuVvEx4HuN

Gun Control policies that are unconstitutional:

•Literally taking all guns 

Gun Control policies that AREN’T:

•Background checks
•Mandatory waiting periods
•Fines for unsafe storage
•Red Flag Laws
•Banning 3rd party transactions
•Registries

It’s not that complicated.

text:
Army of one
Armed with a gun
I pop shots
from a pen
The thoughts within
Lost again in
a nauseous spin
The Frissons,
bleed on,
across
 my
 skin...
#thirstfortheverse #poetry
#poem
#poetrycommunity
